plot: A fed up undercover cop drags his twin brother, a heroic police officer, to the middle of nowhere in order to execute him with no trace of a body and to take his place in his perfect life.
title: Doppelganger
plot_es: A fed up undercover cop drags his twin brother, a heroic police officer, to the middle of nowhere in order to execute him with no trace of a body and to take his place in his perfect life.
plot_en: A fed up undercover cop drags his twin brother, a heroic police officer, to the middle of nowhere in order to execute him with no trace of a body and to take his place in his perfect life.
